page.title: 14TRANSPORT
page.content: Transport is a vital thing as its needed by people to travel from place to place. There are many forms of transport,things like trains,cars,buses,bicycles and for air and sea you can get{aeroplanes}and {boats.}We also have{hovercrafts }for land and sea.The most popular transport around{Southill}are cars. The village is well spaced out and the farms are set away from the village,so cars are needed by the people of{Southill.}A car needs a battery to start it ,a steering wheel to guide it .They also need a gear lever to change speeds.A car runs on petrol.The main roads are usually made of tar or concrete.Many roads in Southill are old bumpy roads.There is one main road that runs through Southill.
